div.ab: these drugs melt in a new earthen pot, & when it will be melted, you will pass it in a clean cloth & you will see a beautiful varnish.

div.head: Another varnish
div.ab: Take one ounce of spike lavender oil & heat it over coals, & then take a half ounce of sang dea Raiec & grind it coarsely, and then put it into the spike lavender oil, & then mix it with a stick until you see that it is melted, and then put it in a glass vial. And when you want to use it, heat it little by little over the coals. And before putting it down, put down a coat of very clear glue, & then put it down with a paintbrush.

div.head: For making red varnish
div.ab: Take vermilion & temper it with gum water as well as with other water, and make it like the other varnish, & mix this other water like the other varnish, and then lay it down as before to make three green.

div.head: For making green trwood
div.ab: Take very strong vinegar, salt, & rainwater, and one needs to put it all together with verdigris, and put it in a new earthen vessel with your wood, & put it in some very warm horse dung for the space of eight or nine days.
